display_html: type TransferParams = ("from" :! Address, "to" :! Address, "value" :! Natural)
name: TransferParams

display_html: type ApproveParams = ("spender" :! Address, "value" :! Natural)
name: ApproveParams

display_html: type AllowanceParams = ("owner" :! Address, "spender" :! Address, "value" :! Natural)
name: AllowanceParams

display_html: type MintParams = ("to" :! Address, "value" :! Natural)
name: MintParams

display_html: type BurnParams = ("from" :! Address, "value" :! Natural)
name: BurnParams

display_html: type LedgerValue = ("balance" :! Natural, "approvals" :! Map Address Natural)
name: LedgerValue

display_html:
data Error
  • = UnsafeAllowanceChange Natural
  • | SenderIsNotAdmin
  • | NotEnoughBalance ("required" :! Natural, "present" :! Natural)
  • | NotEnoughAllowance ("required" :! Natural, "present" :! Natural)
  • | OperationsArePaused
name: Error UnsafeAllowanceChange SenderIsNotAdmin NotEnoughBalance NotEnoughAllowance OperationsArePaused

display_html:
data Storage' fields = Storage' {
  • ledger :: BigMap Address LedgerValue
  • fields :: fields
}
name: Storage' Storage' fields ledger

display_html: mkStorage' :: Map Address Natural -> fields -> Storage' fields
name: mkStorage'

display_html: type StorageFieldsC fields = fields `HasFieldsOfType` ["admin" := Address, "paused" := Bool, "totalSupply" := Natural]
name: StorageFieldsC

display_html: transfer :: forall fields. StorageFieldsC fields => Entrypoint TransferParams fields
name: transfer

display_html: transfer' :: forall fields. StorageFieldsC fields => Entrypoint ("sender" :! Address, TransferParams) fields
name: transfer'

display_html: approve :: forall fields. StorageFieldsC fields => Entrypoint ApproveParams fields
name: approve

display_html: approve' :: forall fields. StorageFieldsC fields => Entrypoint AllowanceParams fields
name: approve'

display_html: getAllowance :: StorageFieldsC fields => Entrypoint (View GetAllowanceParams Natural) fields
name: getAllowance

display_html: getBalance :: StorageFieldsC fields => Entrypoint (View Address Natural) fields
name: getBalance

display_html:
data Parameter
  • = Transfer !TransferParams
  • | Approve !ApproveParams
  • | GetAllowance !(View GetAllowanceParams Natural)
  • | GetBalance !(View Address Natural)
  • | GetTotalSupply !(View () Natural)
  • | SetPause !Bool
  • | SetAdministrator !Address
  • | GetAdministrator !(View () Address)
  • | Mint !MintParams
  • | Burn !BurnParams
name: Parameter Transfer Approve GetAllowance GetBalance GetTotalSupply SetPause SetAdministrator GetAdministrator Mint Burn

display_html:
data Error
  • = UnsafeAllowanceChange Natural
  • | SenderIsNotAdmin
  • | NotEnoughBalance ("required" :! Natural, "present" :! Natural)
  • | NotEnoughAllowance ("required" :! Natural, "present" :! Natural)
  • | OperationsArePaused
name: Error UnsafeAllowanceChange SenderIsNotAdmin NotEnoughBalance NotEnoughAllowance OperationsArePaused

display_html:
data Parameter
  • = Transfer !TransferParams
  • | TransferViaProxy !("sender" :! Address, TransferParams)
  • | Approve !ApproveParams
  • | ApproveViaProxy !("sender" :! Address, ApproveParams)
  • | GetAllowance !(View GetAllowanceParams Natural)
  • | GetBalance !(View Address Natural)
  • | GetTotalSupply !(View () Natural)
  • | SetPause !Bool
  • | SetAdministrator !Address
  • | GetAdministrator !(View () Address)
  • | Mint !MintParams
  • | Burn !BurnParams
  • | SetProxy !Address
name: Parameter Transfer Approve GetAllowance GetBalance GetTotalSupply SetPause SetAdministrator GetAdministrator Mint Burn TransferViaProxy ApproveViaProxy SetProxy

display_html:
data SaneParameter
  • = STransfer !TransferParams
  • | SApprove !ApproveParams
  • | SGetAllowance !(View GetAllowanceParams Natural)
  • | SGetBalance !(View Address Natural)
  • | SGetTotalSupply !(View () Natural)
name: SaneParameter STransfer SApprove SGetAllowance SGetBalance SGetTotalSupply

display_html:
data Parameter
  • = Transfer TransferParams
  • | GetTotalSupply (View () Natural)
  • | GetBalance (View Address Natural)
name: Parameter Transfer GetBalance GetTotalSupply

display_html:
data Storage = Storage {
  • ledger :: BigMap Address Natural
  • totalSupply :: Natural
}
name: Storage Storage ledger totalSupply

display_html:
data Parameter (interface :: [EntryPointKind])
  • = Run (UParam interface)
  • | Upgrade UpgradeParameters
  • | GetVersion (View () Natural)
  • | SetAdministrator Address
  • | EpwBeginUpgrade Natural
  • | EpwApplyMigration MigrationScript
  • | EpwSetCode ContractCode
  • | EpwFinishUpgrade
name: Parameter SetAdministrator Run Upgrade GetVersion EpwBeginUpgrade EpwApplyMigration EpwSetCode EpwFinishUpgrade

display_html:
data Error
  • = SenderIsNotAdmin
  • | VersionMismatch ("expected" :! Natural, "actual" :! Natural)
  • | ContractIsPaused
  • | ContractIsNotPaused
name: Error SenderIsNotAdmin VersionMismatch ContractIsPaused ContractIsNotPaused

display_html: type EntryPointImpl store = Lambda (ByteString, UStore store) ([Operation], UStore store)
name: EntryPointImpl

display_html: type EpwFallback store = Lambda ((MText, ByteString), UStore store) ([Operation], UStore store)
name: EpwFallback

display_html:
data EpwContract interface store = EpwContract {
  • epwServe :: ContractCode
  • epwCodeMigrations :: [MigrationScript]
}
name: EpwContract EpwContract epwServe epwCodeMigrations

display_html:
data EpwCaseClause store (entry :: EntryPointKind) where
  • EpwCaseClause :: TypedEntryPointImpl arg store -> EpwCaseClause store '(name, arg)
name: EpwCaseClause EpwCaseClause

display_html: mkEpwContract :: forall (interface :: [EntryPointKind]) store. (CodeMigrations interface, GetUStoreKey store "code" ~ MText, GetUStoreValue store "code" ~ EntryPointImpl store, GetUStoreField store "fallback" ~ EpwFallback store) => Rec (EpwCaseClause store) interface -> EpwFallback store -> EpwContract interface store
name: mkEpwContract

display_html: mkEpwContractT :: forall clauses (interface :: [EntryPointKind]) store. (clauses ~ Rec (EpwCaseClause store) interface, RecFromTuple clauses, CodeMigrations interface, GetUStoreKey store "code" ~ MText, GetUStoreValue store "code" ~ EntryPointImpl store, GetUStoreField store "fallback" ~ EpwFallback store) => IsoRecTuple clauses -> EpwFallback store -> EpwContract interface store
name: mkEpwContractT

display_html: (/==>) :: Label name -> Lambda (arg, UStore store) ([Operation], UStore store) -> EpwCaseClause store '(name, arg)
removeEndpoint :: forall store name s. (KnownSymbol name, GetUStoreKey store "code" ~ MText) => Label name -> (UStore store ': s) :-> (UStore store ': s)
name: removeEndpoint

display_html:
class EpwDocumented (entries :: [EntryPointKind]) where
  • epwDocument :: Rec (EpwCaseClause store) entries -> Lambda () ()
name: EpwDocumented epwDocument
